text: finding accommodation in Seoul can be
extremely expensive for hostel dorm beds
you can even expect to pay fifteen to
twenty dollars per night so one of the
cheaper options is actually to check out
something called an officetel basically
cubicles made into little little tiny
rooms so I stayed in a in a officetel
here in Seoul and let's go check it out
alright so in here we got a bathroom
right over here check this out the

stove sink and one of the one of the
really cool things about this office
tell is that got free hot rice all the

check out my room
all right welcome to my room this is a
